import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { useBook } from "../../context/BookContext"; // import ProgressBar from "../../components/ProgressBar"; export default function BookingDetails () { const [ticket, setTicket] = useState(0); const increaseTicket = () => setTicket((ticket) => ticket + 1); const decreaseTicket = () => setTicket((ticket) => (ticket > 0 ? ticket - 1 : 0)); const {ticketItems} = useBook(); useEffect (()=> { localStorage.setItem("ticketItem",JSON.stringify(ticketItems)); },[ticketItems]) return( <>
{/*
*/}

    Select Your Tickets

  • Free for kids under 6 and disabled visitors (74%+)
  • Pregnant women, families with strollers, and visitors on crutches can buy priority tickets at the venue

Adult(18+)

{/*

€{Tuscany.price}

*/}

Child(6-17)

  • With valid ID
  • Only in combination with: Adult (18+)
{/*

€{Tuscany.price}

*/}

Infant(0-5)

  • Only in combination with: Adult (18+)
{/*

€{Tuscany.price}

*/}
) } function TicketOverview () { const {ticketItems} = useBook(); useEffect (()=> { localStorage.setItem("ticketItem",JSON.stringify(ticketItems)); },[ticketItems]) return( <>

}>
) }
